title: I would like to know why the town of SHALLOTTE cannot attract chain Restaurants ? We have several fast food restaurants but all the sit down family type restaurants are locally owned.
text:
Just by taking a quick look at http://shallottenc.com/ I see several
restaurants in Shallotte. From driving in and through Shallotte, I
know there are several other restaurants not listed here. So I'm not
sure I understand what's behind your question.
